pages.text: The Blade Smithing Association provides you three standard types of Shealth. You may get them from other smiths, or you may make it yourself, which is a good chance of practicing of your smithing skills.

These three Shealths are respectively called Plain Sheath, Fallen Sakura Sheath and Tri-Thunder Sheath.$(br2)The Plain Sheath is easy to make but has no effects. The Fallen Sakura Sheath has purifying power, white the Tri-Thunder Sheath give the Blade more sharpness.$(br)These 3 Sheath and katanas are also often provided to swordsman of Sword of Logos.
